creator: mashmk02@gmail.com
text: hi The format character string of address displayed by "Listing AJP Worker" is wrong. Index: mod_jk/native/common/jk_status.c =================================================================== --- mod_jk/native/common/jk_status.c (revision 619008) +++ mod_jk/native/common/jk_status.c (working copy) @@ -227,11 +227,11 @@ #define JK_STATUS_SHOW_AJP_CONF_ROW "" \ "%s" \ "%s:%d" \ + "%s" \ "%d" \ "%d" \ "%d" \ "%d" \ - "%d" \ "%u" \ "%u" \ "" \ regards.
Once again: thanks and fixed in r619035.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
